00130     void test_divides_digits () {
00131         const T a[] = {8, 7, 6, 2, 3, 1};
00132         const T b[] = {7, 6, 5};
00133         const T c[] = {4, 3, 2};
00134               T x[10];
00135         const T* p = My::divides_digits(a, a + 6, b, b + 3, x);
00136         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p - x == 3);
00137         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::equal(const_cast<const T*>(x), p, c));}

00388         template <typename T>
00389     void test_plus_digits () {
00390         const T a[] = {4, 3, 2};
00391         const T b[] = {7, 6, 5};
00392         const T c[] = {1, 0, 8};
00393               T x[10];
00394         const T* p = My::plus_digits(a, a + 3, b, b + 3, x);
00395         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p - x == 3);
00396         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::equal(const_cast<const T*>(x), p, c));
00397 
00398         const T a1[] = {4, 3, 2};
00399         const T b1[] = {9};
00400         const T c1[] = {3, 4, 2};
00401               T x1[10];
00402         const T* p1 = My::plus_digits(a1, a1 + 3, b1, b1 + 1, x1);
00403         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p1 - x1 == 3);
00404         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::equal(const_cast<const T*>(x1), p1, c1));
00405 
00406         const T a2[] = {9, 9, 9};
00407         const T b2[] = {1};
00408         const T c2[] = {0, 0, 0, 1};
00409               T x2[10];
00410         const T* p2 = My::plus_digits(a2, a2 + 3, b2, b2 + 1, x2);
00411         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p2 - x2 == 4);
00412         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::equal(const_cast<const T*>(x2), p2, c2));
00413         }

00519     void test_shift_right_digits () {
00520         const int a[] = {2, 3, 4};
00521         const int b[] = {4};
00522               int x[10];
00523         const int *p = My::shift_right_digits(a, a + 3, 2, x);
00524         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::equal(const_cast<const int*>(x), p, b));
00525         
00526                 memset(x, 0, 10 * sizeof(int));
00527                 const int b1[] = {0};
00528                 const int *p1 = My::shift_right_digits(a, a + 3, 3, x);
00529                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::equal(const_cast<const int *>(x), p1, b1));
00530 
00531                 memset(x, 0, 10 * sizeof(int));
00532                 const int b2[] = {0};
00533                 const int *p2 = My::shift_right_digits(a, a + 3, 30, x);
00534                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::equal(const_cast<const int *>(x), p2, b2));
00535 
00536                 memset(x, 0, 10 * sizeof(int));
00537                 const int *p3 = My::shift_right_digits(a, a + 3, 0, x);
00538                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::equal(const_cast<const int *>(x), p3, a));
00539         }

00611     // operator * (Integer, Integer)
00612     // ------------------------------
00613     void test_multiply () {
00614                 const My::Integer<int> a = 1;
00615                 const My::Integer<int> b = 50;
00616                 const My::Integer<int> c = -11;
00617                 const My::Integer<int> d = 40;
00618                 const My::Integer<int> e = 999;
00619                 const My::Integer<int> f = 998001;
00620                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a*b) == My::Integer<int>(50));
00621                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((b*c) == My::Integer<int>(-550));
00622                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((b*d) == My::Integer<int>(2000));
00623                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((e*e) == My::Integer<int>(998001));
00624         }

00626     // operator << (Integer, int)
00627     // ------------------------------
00628     void test_left_shift () {
00629                 const My::Integer<int> a = 101;
00630                 const My::Integer<int> b = 0;
00631                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a << 0) == a);
00632                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a << 1) == My::Integer<int>(1010));
00633                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a << 2) == My::Integer<int>(10100));
00634                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((b << 3) == My::Integer<int>(0));
00635         }
00636     // ------------------------------
00637     // operator >> (Integer, int)
00638     // ------------------------------
00639     void test_right_shift () {
00640                 const My::Integer<int> a = 20101;
00641                 const My::Integer<int> b = 0;
00642                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a >> 0) == a);
00643                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a >> 1) == My::Integer<int>(2010));
00644                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a >> 2) == My::Integer<int>(201));
00645                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a >> 4) == My::Integer<int>(2));
00646                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a >> 5) == My::Integer<int>(0));
00647                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a >> 20) == My::Integer<int>(0));
00648                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((b >> 3) == My::Integer<int>(0));
00649                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((b << 3) == My::Integer<int>(0));
00650                 try {
00651                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a >> -2) == My::Integer<int>(2010100));
00652                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(false);
00653                 } catch (std::invalid_argument& e) {
00654             CPPUNIT_ASSERT(true);
00655                 }
00656         }
00657     // ------------------------------
00658     // Integer::operator - ()
00659     // ------------------------------
00660     void test_negation2(){
00661                 const My::Integer<int> a = 201;
00662                 const My::Integer<int> b = 0;
00663                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((-a) == -201);
00664                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((-b) == 0);
00665         }
00666     // ------------------------------
00667     // Integer::operator ++ () // pre
00668     // ------------------------------
00669 
00670    void test_pre_inc(){
00671                 My::Integer<int> a = 3;
00672                 My::Integer<int> b = -1;
00673                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((++a) == My::Integer<int>(4));
00674                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((++b) ==  My::Integer<int>(0));
00675         }
00676     // ------------------------------
00677     // Integer::operator ++ (int) // post
00678     // ------------------------------
00679     void test_post_inc(){
00680                 My::Integer<int> a = 3;
00681                 My::Integer<int> b = -1;
00682                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a++) == My::Integer<int>(3));
00683                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((b++) ==  My::Integer<int>(-1));
00684         }
00685     // ------------------------------
00686     // Integer::operator -- () // pre
00687     // ------------------------------
00688 
00689    void test_pre_dec(){
00690                 My::Integer<int> a = 3;
00691                 My::Integer<int> b = 0;
00692                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((--a) == My::Integer<int>(2));
00693                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((--b) ==  My::Integer<int>(-1));
00694         }
00695     // ------------------------------
00696     // Integer::operator -- (int) // post
00697     // ------------------------------
00698     void test_post_dec(){
00699                 My::Integer<int> a = 3;
00700                 My::Integer<int> b = -1;
00701                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a--) == My::Integer<int>(3));
00702                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((b--) ==  My::Integer<int>(-1));
00703         }
00704     // ------------------------------
00705     // Integer::operator += (const Integer)
00706     // ------------------------------
00707 
00708     void test_plus_equal(){
00709                 My::Integer<int> a = 12;
00710                 My::Integer<int> b = 0;
00711                 const My::Integer<int> c = 1;
00712                 const My::Integer<int> d = 13;
00713                 My::Integer<int> e = -1;
00714                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a += c) == d);
00715                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((b += b) == b);
00716                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((e += c) == b);
00717         }
00718     // ------------------------------
00719     // Integer::operator -= (const Integer)
00720     // ------------------------------
00721     void test_minus_equal(){
00722                 My::Integer<int> a = 12;
00723                 My::Integer<int> b = 0;
00724                 const My::Integer<int> c = 1;
00725                 const My::Integer<int> d = 11;
00726                 My::Integer<int> e = 1;
00727                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a -= c) == d);
00728                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((b -= b) == b);
00729                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((e -= c) == b);
00730         }
00731     // ------------------------------
00732     // Integer::operator *= (const Integer)
00733     // ------------------------------
00734     void test_multip_equal(){
00735                 My::Integer<int> a = 12;
00736                 My::Integer<int> b = 0;
00737                 const My::Integer<int> c = 1;
00738                 const My::Integer<int> d = 11;
00739                 My::Integer<int> e = -1;
00740                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((b *= a) == b);
00741                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a *= b) == b);
00742                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((b *= b) == b);
00743                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((e *= c) == e);
00744         }
00745     // ------------------------------
00746     // Integer::operator /= (const Integer)
00747     // ------------------------------
00748     void test_divide_equal(){
00749                 My::Integer<int> a = 12;
00750                 My::Integer<int> b = 0;
00751                 const My::Integer<int> c = 1;
00752                 My::Integer<int> d = 11;
00753                 My::Integer<int> e = -1;
00754                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((b /= a) == b);
00755                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((d /= c) == d);
00756                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a /= d) == c);
00757         try{
00758                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a /= b) == b);
00759                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(false);
00760         }
00761         catch (std::invalid_argument& e){
00762             CPPUNIT_ASSERT(true);
00763         }
00764 
00765         }
00766     // ------------------------------
00767     // Integer::operator %= (const Integer)
00768     // ------------------------------
00769     void test_modulo_equal(){
00770                 My::Integer<int> a = 123;
00771                 My::Integer<int> b = 10;
00772                 const My::Integer<int> c = 3;
00773                 My::Integer<int> d = -10;
00774                 My::Integer<int> e = 1;
00775                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a %= b) == 3);
00776                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((b %= c) == e);
00777                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((d %= c) == 2);
00778         }
00779     // ------------------------------
00780     // Integer::operator <<= (int)
00781     // ------------------------------
00782     // ------------------------------
00783     void test_leftshift_equal(){
00784                 My::Integer<int> a = 123;
00785                 My::Integer<int> d = -10;
00786                 My::Integer<int> e = 1;
00787                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a <<= 2) == 12300);
00788                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((d <<= 3) == -10000);
00789                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((e <<= 1) == 10);
00790         }
00791     // ------------------------------
00792     // Integer::operator >>= (int)
00793     // ------------------------------
00794     void test_rightshift_equal(){
00795                 My::Integer<int> a = 123;
00796                 My::Integer<int> d = 10;
00797                 My::Integer<int> e = 10000;
00798                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((a >>= 2) == 1);
00799                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((d >>= 1) == 1);
00800                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT((e >>= 3) == 10);
00801         }
00802     // ------------------------------
